content: the starshine christmas tree skirt is remake of the starshine hugs & kisses blanket pattern so it s a design you may already know and love minus the bobbles this is my first every tree skirt design i was inspired by the new red heart super saver o go christmas yarn of course you can use your favorite yarns and colors to create your own personalized project my tree is a bit small so if you would like to make yours bigger just continue to repeat the 28th to 31st rounds until you have the size you need
